title: Explore Saigon by your own way!

introduction.title: Explore Saigon by your own way
introduction.content: We call this Xplore Saigon - a guidebook website for both domestic and international tourists who want to learn about and travel in Ho Chi Minh City. Xplore Saigon was born in 2024 with the goal of exploring, learning, discovering, and sharing knowledge and experiences about tourism. The word 'Explore' is the most suitable word to describe our website. And X - as we understand it, is an unknown, an interesting thing that is not announced in advance. Xplore Saigon brings you new things, travel suggestions in Saigon, and also motivates you to go and explore everything about this wonderful city. We provide information with the function of a guidebook, your job is to go and experience it yourself. What awaits you on the trip? Only you can know! Come on, Explore Saigon your way.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: Not just a website for tourism promotion, we aim to build Xplore Saigon into a place that connects people through the exploration and understanding of diverse cultures. Moreover, through this project, we want to contribute to promoting sustainable tourism, responsible tourism to the environment and the local community in Ho Chi Minh City.
